title: Example app fixes
body:
These are the last couple of fixes I needed to get the example app running locally.

- Although the .xcode.env files were in the gitignore, they were already checked into the repository and I got unstaged changes updating them as I ran `pod install`.
- The Xcode workspace was referencing a directory which are no longer being generated and errored as missing when building the app.
- The `IDEWorkspaceChecks.plist` was being generated when building from within Xcode.
author: kraenhansen

title: fix: make core-build and metro-config use cjs target
author: robik

comments.body: I believe this can be closed now.

title: Include a package "script" in the Example app running the "polygen" CLI
body: For discoverability it would be good for the "Example app" to have a package "script" invoking the "polygen" CLI.
author: kraenhansen

comments.body: Hmm, I don't think I understand what you mean. Could you elaborate a bit on this?
Essentially, I'd like to see a "polygen:generate" script calling the CLI declared in the package.json of the example app. I can push a PR later to show what I mean.

title: Fix calling generate command from nested directory
author: robik

title: Fix missing returns (closes #10)
body: This PR improved split of generated code and fixed multiple issues, such as missing returns, invalid module creations etc.
author: robik
